text: hum ne (hazrath) Moosa ko kitaab di aur un ke piche aur rasool bheje aur hum ne (hazrath) Isa ibn Maryam ko roushan dalile di aur ruhul qudus17 se un ki tayeed karwaayi, lekin jab kabhi tumhaare paas rasool wo cheez laaye jo tumhaari tabiyato ke qilaaf thi, tum ne jhat se takabbur kiya, pas baaz ko to jhutla diya aur baaz ko qatal bhi kar daala
